title: Add package file — add_pkg_file
text: desc_file DESCRIPTION file. Default "DESCRIPTION", used extract package information. Using add_pkg_file() automatically use DESCRIPTION file current directory create <pkg_name>-package.R "R" directory. want use specific information, author_name author_email, can provide manually. pkg_name Character string, name package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. title Character string, title package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. pkg_description Character string, short description package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. author_name Character string, name package author. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. author_email Character string, email package author. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file. github_url Character string, GitHub URL package. Default NULL, read DESCRIPTION file constructed based package name. output_dir Character string, directory save package file. Default "R". use_figlet Whether use figlet ASCII art generation. Default TRUE. Details see figlet. figlet_font Character string, figlet font use. Default "Slant". colors Character vector, colors use logo elements. unicode Whether use Unicode symbols. Default TRUE. verbose Whether print progress messages. Default TRUE.

text: Integrate message printing function cli package, base::message function. message suppressed base::suppressMessages.

title: Print formatted message — log_message
code: log_message(   ...,   verbose = TRUE,   message_type = c("info", "success", "warning", "error"),   cli_model = TRUE,   level = 1,   symbol = "  ",   text_color = NULL,   back_color = NULL,   text_style = NULL,   multiline_indent = FALSE,   timestamp = TRUE,   timestamp_format = paste0("[", format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "] "),   timestamp_style = TRUE,   .envir = parent.frame(),   .frame = .envir )

title: Print formatted message — log_message
text: ... message print. verbose Whether print message. Default TRUE. message_type Type message. choose one "info", "success", "warning", "error". Default "info". cli_model Whether use cli package print message. Default TRUE. level level message, affects indentation. Level 1 indentation, higher levels add indentation. Default 1. symbol symbol used indentation. specified, ignores level parameter uses symbol directly. Default "  " (two spaces). text_color Color message text. Supports R color names (e.g., "orange"), hexadecimal colors (e.g., "#000000"), basic colors: "red", "green", "blue", "yellow", "magenta", "cyan", "white", "black", "grey", "silver", "none", bright colors: "br_red", "br_green", "br_blue", "br_yellow", "br_magenta", "br_cyan", "br_white", "br_black". Default NULL. back_color Background color message text. Details see parameter text_color. Default NULL. text_style Text styles apply. Can one : "bold", "italic", "underline", "strikethrough", "dim", "inverse". Multiple styles can combined (e.g., c("bold", "underline")). Default NULL. multiline_indent Whether apply consistent formatting (timestamp indentation) line multiline messages. TRUE, line gets full formatting; FALSE, first line gets timestamp. Default FALSE. timestamp Whether show current time message. Default TRUE. timestamp_format Format string timestamp display. Default "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S". timestamp_style Whether apply text styling timestamp message text. TRUE, timestamp formatting matches message; FALSE, timestamp keeps default appearance. Default TRUE. .envir environment evaluate calls . Default parent.frame(). .frame frame use error reporting. Default .envir.
